subject: Television
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: ESPN is shifting the bulk of its Chase for the Sprint Cup championship coverage to its cable network this season, taking 14 of the 17 Nascar races it shares with its partner, ABC.
snippet: ESPN is shifting the bulk of its Chase for the Sprint Cup championship coverage to its cable network this season, taking 14 of the 17 Nascar races it shares with its partner, ABC.
